components.description:
A decorative heart that generally displays as a white heart-shaped cutout in a pink or purple roundrect.

Google previously displayed a pink heart with yellow dots around it, Samsung’s was a pink patterned heart, and Microsoft’s had corner stitches.
components.title: Heart Decoration

description:

Google previously displayed a pink heart with yellow dots around it, Samsung’s was a pink patterned heart, and Microsoft’s had corner stitches.
title: Heart Decoration

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Heart symbol
emoji_net_data.definition: A decorative heart that displays on Apple devices as a white heart-shaped cutout in a pink or purple roundrect. Heart Decoration was approve http://emojipedia.org/heart-decoration/
emoji_net_data.name: heart decoration

bn:00099257a: Of or relating to the heart

bn:00109255a: Having a colour/color that is a dark blend of red and blue.
Of a color intermediate between red and blue
Of a color intermediate between red and blue.

bn:13753606v: To be fond of. Often bracketed or abbreviated with a heart symbol.

bn:00052121n: Love is a variety of different feelings, states, and attitudes that ranges from interpersonal affection to pleasure.
An intense feeling of affection and care towards another person.
A strong positive emotion of regard and affection
In the Italian or Latin languages
The form of romantic affection that is considered pure and wholly positive, not just based on feelings of lust.

Love is a word which refers to a variety of different emotional states, feelings or attitudes which range from those of simple personal pleasures or desires to those characterizing interpersonal affection and many forms of profound kindness, compassion, and benevolent concern for the good of others.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's heart decoration emoji is a delightful embellishment, appearing as a stylized heart with a festive, celebratory flair. Its design on Apple devices features a rich, possibly pink or red hue, enhanced by Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and subtle highlights that suggest it's a charming adornment. This emoji adds a touch of joy and festivity to messages, often used to enhance greetings or express special occasions.
